newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesia rubber market closed for holiday.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia rubber market closed for holiday.

text.p: Indonesian rubber was untraded on Thursday due to a public holiday to observe the anniversary of the birth of the Prophet Muhammad.
Traders said a deal for tyre-grade SIR20 was last done at 44.00 U.S. cents/lb fob Palembang for September shipment on Wednesday.

Offer prices were also quoted at 43.50 for August shipment fob Padang, 44.50 for October shipment fob Medan, 44.00 for August shipment fob Surabaya and 43.75 for August shipment fob Pontianak and Jambi.
